Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel in a beautiful city”
Reviews.Author: LaurenM-86
Reviews.Content: returned 3 night stay locanda boyfriend pleased easily main bus station pretty canal greeted friendly lady spoke english soon found lovely family run hotel reasonably priced venice main attractions walk sights anyway 20min walk st marks square pretty sights restaurants santa croce nicer local cheaper dont people complaining people expect family welcoming clean stayed 12 top tt wasnt biggest ive stayed youre exploring day highly recommend hotel definitely return venice beautiful

Reviews.Title: “Great Budget Option”
Reviews.Author: Dufflepod
Reviews.Content: stayed 6 ago pleased hotel exactly remembered returned week clean friendly budget locanda minutes piazzale roma continental breakfast included price restaurant door adequate recommend da lele tiny bar literally corner hotel cheap glass wine spritz served tasty rolls evening campo santa margherita fringed bars restaurants 5 minute stroll neighbouring sestiere dorsoduro happily stay
